description:
Grab your keys—it’s time to hit the road! The Garvan Long Sleeve Shirt for men was designed to be the perfect travel partner: stylish enough with its double chest pockets and classic silhouette to fit in anywhere, while boasting technical features that make it a hit everywhere.
What featuresyou say? Well, there’s the UV protection for starters —a must on those all-day adventures. It also offers plenty of stretch, delivering comfort as you move. Who said you can’t have it all?
name: Prana Garvan LS Shirt - Mens
